DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Morphine infusion decreases time to mechanical ventilation weaning and extubation, as compared to the combination of fentanyl and midazolam in critically-ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Morphine and Fentanyl/Midazolam in Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: Adults admitted to ICU requiring mechanical ventilation Informed consent Less than 18 years old Consent denial
